name: PongBreakout
description:
This is a combination of Pong and Atari Breakout. It's pretty self explanatory.

If you hold the left arrow or d, The ball will get boosted if it hits you.

You can play against an AI or against someone else on the same computer.

Controls: Arrows and W, A, S, D

WebGL Version (the sound is sometimes missing): https://beritens.github.io/
